TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Queue extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ICloneable
Public Class Queue Implements ICloneable, ICollection
public ref class Queue : ICloneable, System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: 表示对象的先进先出集合。

span.span: Represents a first-in, first-out collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现队列为一个循环的数组。This class implements a queue as a circular array. 对象存储在某一端插入和删除来自其他。Objects stored in a are inserted at one end and removed from the other. 当你需要为信息; 临时存储时，队列和堆栈非常有用也就是说，当你可能想要检索其值后放弃元素。Queues and stacks are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 使用如果你需要访问集合中存储的相同顺序的信息。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 使用如果你需要按相反的顺序访问的信息。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 使用或如果你需要同时从多个线程访问集合。Use or if you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 可以对执行三个主要操作及其元素：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 将元素添加到的末尾。 adds an element to the end of the . - 从开始处移除最旧的元素。 removes the oldest element from the start of the . - 返回在开始时的最旧元素但不会删除从。 returns the oldest element that is at the start of the but does not remove it from the . 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长因子是的数是当前容量的乘数需要更大的容量时。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 确定增长因子时构造。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 默认增长因子为 2.0。The default growth factor is 2.0. 容量将始终按 4 的倍数，而不考虑增长因子至少达到了最小值增加。The capacity of the will always increase by at least a minimum of four, regardless of the growth factor. 例如，增长因子为 1.0 会始终增加容量由 4 个需要更大的容量时。For example, a with a growth factor of 1.0 will always increase in capacity by four when a greater capacity is required. 接受`null`作为有效的值，并允许重复的元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. 此集合的泛型版本，请参阅 For the generic version of this collection, see ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并将值添加到以及如何打印出其值。The following example shows how to create and add values to a and how to print out its values. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保的线程安全性，所有操作必须通过返回的包装器来都完成方法。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长因子是的数是当前容量的乘数需要更大的容量时。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 确定增长因子时构造。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长因子是的数是当前容量的乘数需要更大的容量时。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 确定增长因子时构造。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 容量始终将增加最小值，而不考虑增长因子; 将不会阻止 1.0 增长因子从大小在增加。The capacity of the will always increase by a minimum value, regardless of the growth factor; a growth factor of 1.0 will not prevent the from increasing in size. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到时调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

summary.span: 创建 的浅表副本。

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的浅表副本复制仅的元素集合，不论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但它不会复制引用所引用的对象。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新集合中的引用都指向原始集合中的引用指向同一对象。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 与此相反，集合的深层副本复制这些元素，以及由这些元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过调用可确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 此方法执行的线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象和方法`obj`以确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `obj` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本，通过进行此决定和方法`obj`参数的集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `obj` parameter on the objects in the collection.

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目，可以存储。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can store. 是中的实际的元素数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量始终是大于或等于。The capacity of a is always greater than or equal to . 如果添加元素时超过容量，通过在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组自动增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 新的容量取决于当前容量乘以增长因子，这是确定何时构造。The new capacity is determined by multiplying the current capacity by the growth factor, which is determined when the is constructed. 容量始终将增加最小值，而不考虑增长因子; 将不会阻止 1.0 增长因子从大小在增加。The capacity of the will always increase by a minimum value, regardless of the growth factor; a growth factor of 1.0 will not prevent the from increasing in size. 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素的数目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 如元素添加到，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 增长因子是的数是当前容量的乘数需要更大的容量时。The growth factor is the number by which the current capacity is multiplied when a greater capacity is required. 确定增长因子时构造。The growth factor is determined when the is constructed. 容量始终将增加最小值，而不考虑增长因子; 将不会阻止 1.0 增长因子从大小在增加。The capacity of the will always increase by a minimum value, regardless of the growth factor; a growth factor of 1.0 will not prevent the from increasing in size. 如果小于比在内部数组的容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。If is less than the capacity of the internal array, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果在内部数组需要可重新分配以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the internal array needs to be reallocated to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到，从中移除元素，或查看元素的开始处。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the beginning of the . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.Enqueue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.Enqueue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确保的线程安全性，所有操作必须通过返回的包装器来都完成方法。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何同步，确定如果已同步，以及如何使用同步。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于 方法，但 不修改 。This method is similar to the method, but does not modify the . `null` 可以添加到作为值。`null` can be added to the as a value. 若要区分 null 值和结束，检查属性或 catch ，时引发为空。To distinguish between a null value and the end of the , check the property or catch the , which is thrown when the is empty. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到，从中移除元素，或查看元素的开始处。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the beginning of the . summary.span: 返回将包装原始队列并且是线程安全的新的 。

span.span: Returns a new that wraps the original queue, and is thread safe.

returns.span: 同步的（线程安全） 包装。

span.span: A wrapper that is synchronized (thread safe).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的包装器将在操作执行前锁定队列，以便以线程安全的方式执行此操作。The wrapper returned by this method locks the queue before an operation is performed so that it is performed in a thread-safe manner. 若要确保的线程安全性，必须通过此包装器仅执行所有操作。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through this wrapper only. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何同步，确定如果同步以及如何使用同步。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建的同步的版本，使用方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 但是，派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本使用属性。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的，而不是直接在。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. [!code-cpp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Queue.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 则不会修改。The is not modified. 新数组中元素的顺序是从开始处的元素的顺序相同到其末尾。The order of the elements in the new array is the same as the order of the elements from the beginning of the to its end. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何复制到一维数组。The following example shows how to copy a into a one-dimensional array. span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于降低队列的内存开销，如果没有新的元素将添加到队列。This method can be used to minimize a queue's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the queue. 若要重置为其初始状态，请在调用方法之前调用。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling . 截去空的容量设置到默认的容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .
